    Details of a sighting of a type of animal by an individual spotter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getAnimal()
      Return the type of animal spotted.
      int getArea()
      Return the ID of the area in which they were seen.
      int getCount()
      Return how many were spotted.
      java.lang.String getDetails()
      Return a string containing details of the animal, the number seen, where they were seen, who spotted them and when.
      int getPeriod()
      Return the period in which they were seen.
      int getSpotter()
      Return the ID of the spotter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sighting

        public Sighting​(java.lang.String animal,
                int spotter,
                int count,
                int area,
                int period)
        Create a record of a sighting of a particular type of animal.
        Parameters:
        animal - The animal spotted.
        spotter - The ID of the spotter.
        count - How many were seen (>= 0).
        area - The ID of the area in which they were seen.
        period - The reporting period.
